title: AuRa: Rlp exception on system account check
body:
BlockchainProcessor encountered an exception. System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Index was outside the bounds of the array.
   at Nethermind.Core.Encoding.RlpStream.ReadByte() in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Core/Encoding/RlpStream.cs:line 583
   at Nethermind.Core.Encoding.RlpStream.PeekPrefixAndContentLength() in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Core/Encoding/RlpStream.cs:line 476
   at Nethermind.Store.TrieNode.SeekChild(Int32 itemToSetOn) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/TrieNode.cs:line 288
   at Nethermind.Store.TrieNode.ResolveChild(Int32 i) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/TrieNode.cs:line 303
   at Nethermind.Store.TrieNode.GetChild(Int32 childIndex) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/TrieNode.cs:line 377
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.TraverseBranch(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 465
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.TraverseNode(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 322
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.Run(Span`1 updatePath, Int32 nibblesCount, Byte[] updateValue, Boolean isUpdate, Boolean ignoreMissingDelete, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 302
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.Get(Span`1 rawKey, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 227
   at Nethermind.Store.StateTree.Get(Address address, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateTree.cs:line 47
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.GetState(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 548
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.GetAndAddToCache(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 560
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.AccountExists(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 92
   at Nethermind.AuRa.Contracts.SystemContract.EnsureSystemAccount(IStateProvider stateProvider) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.AuRa/Contracts/SystemContract.cs:line 76
   at Nethermind.AuRa.Validators.ContractValidator.LoadValidatorsFromContract(BlockHeader blockHeader) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.AuRa/Validators/ContractValidator.cs:line 231
   at Nethermind.AuRa.Validators.ContractValidator.PreProcess(Block block, ProcessingOptions options) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.AuRa/Validators/ContractValidator.cs:line 122
   at Nethermind.AuRa.Validators.MultiValidator.PreProcess(Block block, ProcessingOptions options) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.AuRa/Validators/MultiValidator.cs:line 127
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.BlockProcessor.ProcessOne(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/BlockProcessor.cs:line 208
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.BlockProcessor.Process(Keccak branchStateRoot, Block[] suggestedBlocks, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/BlockProcessor.cs:line 125
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.BlockchainProcessor.Process(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/BlockchainProcessor.cs:line 370
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.BlockchainProcessor.RunProcessingLoop() in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/BlockchainProcessor.cs:line 243
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.InnerInvoke()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.<>c.<.cctor>b__274_0(Object obj)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ExecuteWithThreadLocal(Task& currentTaskSlot, Thread threadPoolThread)
